properties.entry: SELECT BIDDING_NO , PRODUCT_SIZE , BIDDING_PRICE , TO_CHAR(DEAL_DATE, 'RRRR/MM/DD') "DEAL_DATE" FROM TB_BIDDING WHERE BIDDING_STATUS = 'Y' AND DEAL_CHECK = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_CODE = ? ORDER BY DEAL_DATE DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_SIZE , BIDDING_PRICE , COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_BIDDING WHERE BIDDING_STATUS = 'Y' AND BIDDING_TYPE = 1 AND DEAL_CHECK = 'N' AND PRODUCT_CODE = ? GROUP BY PRODUCT_SIZE, BIDDING_PRICE ORDER BY BIDDING_PRICE DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_SIZE , BIDDING_PRICE , COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_BIDDING WHERE BIDDING_STATUS = 'Y' AND BIDDING_TYPE = 2 AND DEAL_CHECK = 'N' AND PRODUCT_CODE = ? GROUP BY PRODUCT_SIZE, BIDDING_PRICE ORDER BY BIDDING_PRICE

SELECT BIDDING_NO , PRODUCT_SIZE , BIDDING_PRICE , TO_CHAR(DEAL_DATE, 'RRRR/MM/DD') "DEAL_DATE" FROM TB_BIDDING WHERE BIDDING_STATUS = 'Y' AND DEAL_CHECK = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_CODE = ? AND PRODUCT_SIZE = ? ORDER BY DEAL_DATE DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_SIZE , BIDDING_PRICE , COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_BIDDING WHERE BIDDING_STATUS = 'Y' AND BIDDING_TYPE = 2 AND DEAL_CHECK = 'N' AND PRODUCT_CODE = ? AND PRODUCT_SIZE = ? GROUP BY PRODUCT_SIZE, BIDDING_PRICE ORDER BY BIDDING_PRICE

SELECT PRODUCT_SIZE , BIDDING_PRICE , COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_BIDDING WHERE BIDDING_STATUS = 'Y' AND BIDDING_TYPE = 1 AND DEAL_CHECK = 'N' AND PRODUCT_CODE = ? AND PRODUCT_SIZE = ? GROUP BY PRODUCT_SIZE, BIDDING_PRICE ORDER BY BIDDING_PRICE DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_SIZE , MIN(BIDDING_PRICE) "BIDDING_PRICE" FROM TB_BIDDING WHERE BIDDING_STATUS = 'Y' AND BIDDING_TYPE = 2 AND DEAL_CHECK = 'N' AND PRODUCT_CODE = ? GROUP BY PRODUCT_SIZE ORDER BY PRODUCT_SIZE

SELECT PRODUCT_SIZE , MAX(BIDDING_PRICE) "BIDDING_PRICE" FROM TB_BIDDING WHERE BIDDING_STATUS = 'Y' AND BIDDING_TYPE = 1 AND DEAL_CHECK = 'N' AND PRODUCT_CODE = ? GROUP BY PRODUCT_SIZE ORDER BY PRODUCT_SIZE

SELECT ROWNUM , BIDDING_NO , PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_SIZE , BIDDING_PRICE , DELIVERY_FEE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM , BIDDING_NO , PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_SIZE , BIDDING_PRICE , DELIVERY_FEE FROM TB_BIDDING WHERE BIDDING_TYPE = 2 AND DEAL_CHECK = 'N' AND PRODUCT_CODE = ? AND PRODUCT_SIZE = ? AND BIDDING_PRICE = ? ORDER BY BIDDING_DATE ASC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
